After that, you mentioned that we had already established that earlier, and then asked what our previous discussion was about again.

what is your favorite color

According to various surveys and studies, some of the most commonly preferred colors are:

green

Did you know that green is also the color of money in many countries, including India (where your name Chirag originates)? Perhaps it brings you good luck?
